title: Insurance Code
context: PART IV. UNIVERSAL AVAILABILITY OF LONG-TERM CARE INSURANCE [ยง431:10H-401] Publicizing of policies. For purposes of section 371-16, upon request by an employer, labor organization, retiree organization, or other entity specified under the definition of &ldquo;group long-term care insurance&rdquo; in section 431:10H-104, an insurer that is subject to this part shall be allowed, if it chooses, to publicize a long-term care policy and may sell and underwrite that policy. [L 1999, c 93, pt of ยง2]
